    public class Board
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Board GUI for implementation with various games Author: Kirill Levin, Troy Vasiga, Chris Ingram Mr. Benum (modifications for writing text)
    See Also:

      void addLetter(Coordinate c)
      Adds the letter at coordinate c to the word array to create a word pre: none post: Letter at coordinate c is added to the word array list
      void addPoints()
      Corresponding points are accumulated after words are inputed pre: none post: variable 'points' is incremented
      void addSelection(Coordinate c)
      Adds the clicked grid coordinate to the selections array list Pre: c > 0 Post: Argument c is added to selections array list and the board is repainted to update the highlighted cords
      boolean checkLength()
      Checks the last inputed word is of the correct length pre: wordList can't be empty post: A boolean is returned
      void checkTime()
      Elapsed time between startTime and time after events occur is measured and stored pre: none post: endTime and elapsedTime are initialized
      boolean checkWordFile()
      The last inputed word is compared to all the words for WordList.txt pre: wordList must not empty post: returns a boolean
      void displayMessage(java.lang.String theMessage)
      Sets the message to be displayed under the board
      void displayTime()
      Remaining time for the game is displayed pre: none post: timeMessage is initialized
      void drawLine(int row1, int col1, int row2, int col2)
      Draws a line on the board using the given co-ordinates as endpoints
      void endGame()
      Boolean gameState is changed to true pre: none post: gameState is now true
      void enterWord()
      Last entered word is entered into the wordList array pre: none post: A word formed from the word arrayList is added to the wordList array and the word arrayList is cleared
      Coordinate getClick()
      Waits for user to click somewhere and then returns the click.
      Coordinate getLastCord()
      Returns the last cord in the grid that was highlighted pre: selections can't be empty post: the last element of arrayList selections is returned
      int getPoints()
      The corresponding points to the last inputed word is returned pre: wordList can't be empty post: a number from 1 to 15 is returned
      void initalizeWordFile()
      words.txt is prepared for file writing pre: The text file to be written on must be found in the same folder as this class post: words.txt is overwritten and PrintWriter is initialized
      void initializeFile()
      Variables necessary for text file reading are initialized pre: The text file to be read must be found in the same folder as this class post: Variables and the stream are initialized

      Checks if the last selected cord has other selected cords adjacent to it pre: none post: a boolean is returned
